content: For feedback, use the link on the Thunderbird help menu. That link will take you to this website https://connect.mozilla.org not Thunderbird support.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thunderbird version 115 "get help" takes me to support@mozilla.org.
creator: JudsonMcCranie

content: Thunderbird version 115 "get help" takes me to support.mozilla.org

content:
Did you see the Share ideas and feedback link 5 items below the get help entry?

There is currently no way to show the password as you enter it so you have an idea or feedback on what would make your experience better..
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Most folk use the font size comment on the application menu to control the user interface font sizes, but things can be odd on Linux as there are all sorts of video drivers of varying quality. Turning the hardware acceleration on or off in settings can change things for the better, as can using a thunderbird built package rather than a modified distribution package.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
to get to the point of asking a question you must have typed into the support site something

I tried it with "Threaded messages" https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird#search

The first result returned was https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/message-threading-thunderbird

the article answers all your questions about what it is and how to control it.
creator: MattAuSupport
